thread.title: Nationwide snow causes travel chaos as roads close and flights are cancelled
thread.title_full: Nationwide snow causes travel chaos as roads close and flights are cancelled

title: Nationwide snow causes travel chaos as roads close and flights are cancelled
text: Nationwide snow causes travel chaos as roads close and flights are cancelled Independent.ie Snowstorms closed a number of roads around the country and grounded a number of London-bound flights as the cold snap continued this evening. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/nationwide-snow-causes-travel-chaos-as-roads-close-and-flights-are-cancelled-35363202.html Snow falling in North County Dublin. Pic:Mark Condren 12.1.2017 Snow falling in North County Dublin. Pic:Mark Condren Snow falling in North County Dublin. Pic:Mark Condren 12.1.2017 The heaviest snow would most likely fall over Ulster, Connacht, north Leinster and west Munster, as well as on high ground. Stock picture Snowstorms closed a number of roads around the country and grounded a number of London-bound flights as the cold snap continued this evening.
